categories: Category:Cut content from Who's Who: Imperial Grand Admirals
Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Recondite was the personal Imperial-class Star Destroyer of Grand Admiral Nial Declann. It was presumably with him at the Battle of Endor.
Dan Wallace originally named the Recondite in a segment of his Grand Admirals article that was cut, and is therefore unofficial.
Recondite means hidden, and the ship was named to reflect Declann's moody nature.
